sn2.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn2.1:1.3: Atha kho kassapo devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho kassapo devaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn2.1:1.4: “bhikkhum bhagava pakasesi, no ca bhikkhuno anusasan”ti.
sn2.1:3.3: Atha kho kassapo devaputto “samanunno me sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
